[style=text_callout]Double click[/style].message: [style=text_callout]ƉȏմБ⌊έ ϲ⌊їϲќ[/style] ȃ մƞїҭ ҭȏ ƨέ⌊έϲҭ ƨїʍї⌊ȃȓ մƞїҭƨ
[style=text_callout]Double click[/style].original: [style=text_callout]Double click[/style] a unit to select similar units

[style=text_callout]Left Click + Hold[/s.message: [style=text_callout]₤έғҭ Ҫ⌊їϲќ + Ӈȏ⌊ɗ[/style] ȃƞɗ ɗȓȃɠ ҭȏ ῴїƞɗȏῴ ƨέ⌊έϲҭ ʍմ⌊ҭї⍴⌊έ մƞїҭƨ
[style=text_callout]Left Click + Hold[/s.original: [style=text_callout]Left Click + Hold[/style] and drag to window select multiple units

[style=text_callout]Left Click[/style] t.message: [style=text_callout]₤έғҭ Ҫ⌊їϲќ[/style] ҭȏ ƨέ⌊έϲҭ մƞїҭ, [style=text_callout]ℝїɠнҭ Ҫ⌊їϲќ[/style] ғȏȓ ȃϲҭїȏƞ.
[style=text_callout]Left Click[/style] t.original: [style=text_callout]Left Click[/style] to select unit, [style=text_callout]Right Click[/style] for action.

[style=text_callout]Shift + Right Click[.message: [style=text_callout]Ṡнїғҭ + ℝїɠнҭ Ҫ⌊їϲќ[/style] ҭȏ Գմέմέ մ⍴ ʍմ⌊ҭї⍴⌊έ ȏȓɗέȓƨ
[style=text_callout]Shift + Right Click[.original: [style=text_callout]Shift + Right Click[/style] to queue up multiple orders
